meanings.definition: To cover or coat with a thick layer of paint or pigment.
meanings.sent1: She impastes the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The artist impastes the mural with textured layers of paint.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy painter accidentally impastes the floor with a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions impastes her art with raw intensity.
meanings.sent5: The brush impastes the canvas, creating a rich tapestry of hues.

meanings.definition: A thick layer of paint or pigment applied to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The impastes on the wall added depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent2: The artist used impastes to give the painting a three-dimensional effect.
meanings.sent3: The playful child left impastes on the table after a messy art session.
meanings.sent4: The impastes on the sculpture made it come alive with color.
meanings.sent5: The impastes on the canvas stood out, inviting viewers to touch and feel.
